solution_line_template: With the amount borrowed from her family, she has a total of {borrowed_brother}+{borrowed_father}+{borrowed_mother}= <<{borrowed_brother}+{borrowed_father}+{borrowed_mother}={total_borrowed}>>{total_borrowed} dollars.
With the amount gifted from her granny, she has {gifted_granny}+{total_borrowed} = <<{gifted_granny}+{total_borrowed}={total_after_granny_gift}>>{total_after_granny_gift} dollars.

She adds this to her savings, ending up with a total of {total_after_granny_gift}+{initial_savings} = <<{total_after_granny_gift}+{initial_savings}={total_money_before_spending}>>{total_money_before_spending} dollars.
She spends {spent_fraction} of this money, which is {spent_fraction}*{total_money_before_spending} = <<{spent_fraction}*{total_money_before_spending}={money_spent}>>{money_spent} dollars.
The total she remains with is {total_money_before_spending}-{money_spent} = <<{total_money_before_spending}-{money_spent}={remaining_money}>>{remaining_money} dollars
